Posts.Content: Jun 6, 2011 05:30PM michelleg1122 wrote: definatly give your dr a call.  i had my biopsy last tuesday and found a lump directly under the incision site yesterday.  i have the luxury of working for my dr  and he said it was probibly just some blood /inflamation but we are keeping an eye on it, if it gets bigger then we should worry. but put a call in to your dr just to be sure
Posts.Title: lump found after biopsy mareaj Totie

Posts.Content: Jun 13, 2011 04:12PM michelleg1122 wrote: Kasi, I work for an internal medicine dr in ma.  let me know if you need any info on dr.s in boston. we have a few that we have refered too and one that i know of that a friend of mine goes too ( her mother who had bc went to her as well, I am actually making an appt with her) best of luck

Posts.Content: Jun 7, 2011 02:17PM michelleg1122 wrote: I am so sorry that your results were positive.  we had our tests done about the same time and I have been following you while waiting for my own results.  Foutunately my biopsy came back negative ( i am looking into a lumpectomy because I do already have PASH and this is the second biopsy on that site).  Please keep us posted.

I wish you luck . keep us posted
